tool_description: Validates and standardizes journal name abbreviations according to established standards (ISO, MEDLINE, etc.), providing corrections for non-standard abbreviations.

journal_names.description: Array of journal names to check and standardize

abbreviation_standard.description: Abbreviation standard to use (ISO, MEDLINE, custom)

return_full_names.description: Whether to also return full journal names

error_messages: Empty journal names: Provide at least one journal name for checking.
Unsupported abbreviation standard: Use one of [ISO, MEDLINE, custom].
Journal not found: One or more journal names could not be found in abbreviation databases.
Database access error: Unable to access journal abbreviation database.
usage: Submit journal names to receive standardized abbreviations and validation against established abbreviation standards.

validation_status.description: Validation status for each journal name

corrections_made.description: Number of journal names that required correction

unrecognized_journals.description: Journal names not found in standard databases
